Here are some extra notes on the dependencies used in this project.
In production, you may or may not want to use these dependencies.
Please do your own research.


////////////////////
UNITY TEST FRAMEWORK
This project uses an experimental version of this Unity Test Framework...
https://forum.unity.com/threads/unity-test-framework-2-0-ready-for-feedback.1230126/

Which enables many features used in the sample project such as...
https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.test-framework@2.0/manual/reference-async-tests.html


////////////////////
UNITY CODE COVERAGE
This project uses a production version of Unity Code Coverage...
https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.testtools.codecoverage@1.2/manual/index.html


////////////////////
NSUBSTITUTE

This project uses a community-based Unity version of NSubstitute...
https://github.com/Thundernerd/Unity3D-NSubstitute/tree/main

Which is based on non-Unity technology for testing...
https://nsubstitute.github.io/help/creating-a-substitute/#substituting_infrequently_and_carefully_for_classes
